refnamediv.refpurpose: Create a state vector for tracking applications

refsynopsisdiv.title: Syntax
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: sv = StateVector(dim) sv = StateVector(dim, fill_value) sv = StateVector(data)

listitem.para: Integer, dimension of the state vector
Scalar, value to fill the state vector (default: 0)
Column vector, initial data for the state vector
Column vector, the created state vector

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: StateVector creates a state vector suitable for use with Stone Soup tracking algorithms. State vectors represent the estimated state of a tracked object, typically containing position and velocity components.
The function provides three calling conventions:

listitem.para: StateVector(dim) - Creates a zero-filled vector of dimension dim
StateVector(dim, fill_value) - Creates a vector filled with fill_value
StateVector(data) - Creates a vector from existing data
